thread.title: BRIEF-PNM Resources Reports Quarterly GAAP Diluted EPS $0.19

title: BRIEF-PNM Resources Reports Quarterly GAAP Diluted EPS $0.19
text:
36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-PNM Resources Reports Quarterly GAAP Diluted EPS $0.19 Reuters Staff
 PNM Resources Inc: * PNM RESOURCES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* SEES FY 2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.04 TO $2.16 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.82 TO $1.92 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * QUARTERLY GAAP DILUTED EPS $0.19
* QTRLY TOTAL ELECTRIC OPERATING REVENUES $317.9 MILLION VERSUS $330.2 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
